title: Pharmaceutical sector growth worldwide 2017 - 2030 , by country
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Growth in percentage for 20 number of Countrys.
Country India has the highest Growth in percentage and Japan has the lowest Growth in percentage.
There is a difference of 115.0 between the maximum Country India and minimum Country Japan.
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Growth in percentage in each Country on the y axis.
The Growth in percentage is appeared to be the highest at Country India and lowest at Country Japan.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Growth in percentage for 20 number of Countrys.
Country India has the highest Growth in percentage and Japan has the lowest Growth in percentage.
There is a difference of 115.0 between the maximum Country India and minimum Country Japan.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Growth in percentage for 20 number of Countrys.
Country India has the highest Growth in percentage and Japan has the lowest Growth in percentage.
The second highest Growth in percentage is appeared to be the Country China.
The lowest value at Country Japan is 1.98x times less than the highest value at India.
Growth in percentage at Country India is 232.0 , second place is China at 230.0, and thirdly is Indonesia at 196.0.
Similar Growth in percentage is found in Country Spain, and France.
The Country India has 1.52 times more Growth in percentage than average.
The Growth in percentage is 3051.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
